lead_paragraph: Some advocates fear the topic has fallen off the American list of priorities in the region amid Beijing’s rise as a geopolitical power.

headline.print_headline: Pressing His Asia Agenda, Obama Treads Lightly on Human Rights
headline.main: Pressing Asia Agenda, Obama Treads Lightly on Human Rights

snippet: Some advocates fear the topic has fallen off the American list of priorities in the region amid Beijing’s rise as a geopolitical power....
abstract: Pres Obama has avoided chastising nations on their human rights records on his trip to China and to Laos to attend summit meeting of Asian nations, in part to avoid alienating countries at same time China is ascendant geopolitical power in region; rights advocates criticize Obama's tactic as timid.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
